mapper.sql: select a.*, (select count(1) from song_with_artist s_w_a LEFT JOIN song so on s_w_a.songId=so.id where s_w_a.artistId=a.id and so.type=1 ) as singleSongCount , (select count(1) from album al where al.artistId=a.id) as albumCount, (select count(1) from song_with_artist s_w_a LEFT JOIN song so on s_w_a.songId=so.id where s_w_a.artistId=a.id and so.type=2) as mvCount, zd1.text as sexText, zd2.text as countryText from artist a left join zd zd1 on (a.sex=zd1.code and zd1.type='sex' ) left join zd zd2 on(a.country=zd2.code and zd2.type='country')
mapper.select: select * from artist where id in(select artistId from song_with_artist where songId=#{songId})
select * from artist order by watchCount DESC
